Apos.​Input.​GamePadCondition
Apos.​Input.​ICondition
public
Apos.​Input.​GamePadCondition

Checks various conditions on a specific gamepad button.  Non static methods implicitly make sure that the game is active. Otherwise returns false.

Constructors
GamePadCondition
public GamePadCondition(
GamePadButton button,
int gamePadIndex
)
Parameters
button
GamePadButton

The button to operate on.

gamePadIndex
int

The index of the gamepad to operate on.

Public Functions
Pressed
public bool Pressed()
Returns

Returns true when the button was not pressed and is now pressed.

Held
public bool Held()
Returns

Returns true when the button is now pressed.

HeldOnly
public bool HeldOnly()
Returns

Returns true when the button was pressed and is now pressed.

Released
public bool Released()
Returns

Returns true when the button was pressed and is now not pressed.

GamePadButton button,

)
Returns

Released

GamePadButton button,
int gamePadIndex
)
Returns

Returns true when the button was pressed and is now not pressed.

Private Variables
_button
private GamePadButton _button

The button that will be checked.

_gamePadIndex
private int _gamePadIndex

The index for the gamepad that will be checked.
